text: Timothy Dennis Awany (born 6 August 1996) is an Ugandan professional footballer who plays for F.C. Ashdod and the Uganda national team as a defender. ==Club career== Awany played for Kampala Capital City Authority. In July 2019, he joined Israeli Premier League side F.C. Ashdod. ==International career== Awany made his international debut in 2016, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- |colspan="3"|Uganda national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2016||3||0 |- |2017||10||0 |- |2018||6||0 |- |2019||6||0 |- !Total||25||0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Ugandan footballers Category:Uganda international footballers Category:Kampala Capital City Authority FC players Category:F.C. title: Timothy Awany
